revised_title: Description of the Living and Extinct Races of Gigantic Land-Tortoises: The Galapagos Islands and Mascarenes
tldr: The author examines the remains of gigantic land-tortoises from the Galapagos Islands and the Mascarenes, concluding that they were indigenous to their respective locations and had distinct species characteristics. The study also reveals the existence of four living species of tortoises in the Galapagos Islands, each with unique features.
